active_learning.discussion_prompt: In the context of NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2 (and draft Rev. 3), debate the role of Technology Watch in proactive Incident Response Team Organization. How can monitoring emerging technologies like OT DFIR challenges (e.g., ICS-specific threats) prevent incidents? Provide pros/cons, real-world examples from recent breaches (e.g., ransomware in industrial controls), and links to CSF 2.0 alignment. Divide into teams to argue for/against mandatory Technology Watch roles in all IR teams.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
